stages.label: The First Conflict (Violence)
stages.prompt: You were barely an adult when your first true trial of strength occurred. How did you strike back at the world?
stages.introspection: My hands were stained but my heart was set.

stages.label: The Social Crucible (Control)
stages.prompt: Words and presence are often sharper than iron. When you were challenged by authority, how did you dominate the situation?
stages.introspection: I realized then that the mind is the greatest weapon.

stages.label: Standing Fast (Protection)
stages.prompt: The world tried to break you, but you refused to move. During the siege of your youth, how did you hold the line?
stages.introspection: I became the mountain that the storm could not move.

stages.label: The Internal War (Willpower)
stages.prompt: Doubt is a poison. When your spirit was at its lowest ebb, how did you find your resolve?
stages.introspection: The fire within burned brighter than the ice without.

stages.label: The Long Road (Wandering I)
stages.prompt: You left your home behind to seek something greater. What lesson did you learn on the frontier?
stages.introspection: The road taught me what the classroom could not.

stages.label: The Hardship (Wandering II)
stages.prompt: Survival is not guaranteed. When resources were thin and your companions were weary, what was your role?
stages.introspection: We survived because I knew what had to be done.

stages.label: The Discovery (Wandering III)
stages.prompt: In the ruins of the old world, you found a fragment of truth. How did you process this revelation?
stages.introspection: The past whispered to me, and I finally understood.

stages.label: The Final Preparation (Wandering IV)
stages.prompt: Before you set out on this final quest, what last skill did you master to ensure your legend?
stages.introspection: I am ready. Let the weavers tell the tale.

context_intro.violence: Growing up in a harsh land, your first conflict defined you.
context_intro.control: As you matured, you learned that social power is the key to leadership.
context_intro.protection: When the shadows grew long, you served as a shield for those you loved.
context_intro.willpower: Even when isolated and broken, your inner spirit refused to fade.
context_intro.wandering_1: Your travels took you far beyond the familiar borders.
context_intro.wandering_2: The wilderness was unforgiving, testing your very limits.
context_intro.wandering_3: Ancient secrets revealed themselves to you in the deep dark.
context_intro.wandering_4: With your training complete, you stood on the precipice of destiny.
